title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3241/92 of 6 November 1992 releasing securities lodged in respect of import licences under Regulation (EEC) No 564/92 for pigmeat products
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 3241/92  of 6 November 1992  releasing securities lodged in respect of import licences under Regulation (EEC) No 564/92 for pigmeat products
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Securities lodged in respect of import licences issued on 23 July 1992 for products covered by groups 1, 2, 3 and 4 in Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 564/92 but not imported before the expiry of the term of validity of those licences shall be  released.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 November 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 56, 29. 2. 1992, p. 6. (2) OJ No L 61, 6. 3. 1992, p. 9.
